page.title: 03Transport Kylar's Car
page.content: {Kylar.} My Dad has a car. I go on holiday on it. I help my dad by washing the car. When his car is broken sometimes he takes it to the garage to get mended. My Dad teaches my Mam to drive. On Sundays he takes me for a run out in the car. Sometimes he takes me to Chatton to see the lambs. My Dad sometimes gets his petrol at Alnwick. My Dad's car is light blue. It is a Honda. Sometimes on Saturdays my dad takes all the family to Morpeth. He goes to work in the car. His car is not second hand. It was a new one.
